function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of highly infectious airborne virus","Impact":"Risk of widespread transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air quality and ventilation to reduce the spread of airborne viruses","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UVGI technology, air disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building designers, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate guidelines for building attributes","Impact":"Lack of standardized guidelines may lead to poor indoor environmental quality","Mitigation":"Establishing and enforcing comprehensive guidelines for indoor air quality, ventilation, lighting, and thermal conditions","Technologies":"Sensor technology, building management systems, data analytics","People":"Building designers, construction professionals, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Industry organizations, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Limited research on building attributes","Impact":"Insufficient understanding of how building attributes affect occupant health","Mitigation":"Investing in research on the impact of building attributes on occupant health, promoting collaboration between researchers and industry professionals","Technologies":"Sensors, data analytics, simulation models","People":"Researchers, industry professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, industry organizations"}]}
